eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Archuleta, CO; AT 05:15 PM ON OCT 13, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 05:15 PM OCT 14, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: ASCO EM is issuing a mandatory evacuation notice for homes in the South side San Juan River Village, County Road 335-Rainbow Rd., morning Rain Ct., Evening Rain Ct., County Road 337/County Road 339-Last Resort RV Park, properties on County Road 339 nearest to the Blanco River, County Road 500-Estates Cir., Hermosa St., and San Juan St. in Pagosa Springs. Evacuation Center is set up at the Pagosa Springs Community Center.  Follow Archuleta County Sheriff’s Office Facebook Page for regular updates. All low-lying areas near San Juan and Blanco rivers are in Mandatory Evacuation status. Follow ACSO Facebook page for further instruction.
